answerText: the "Shot Heard 'Round the World" baseball [or obvious equivalents; prompt on baseball][10] The baseball is eventually bought by the waste management worker Nick Shay, the lover of the artist Klara Sax, in this novel.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This object's final owner purchases it from Marvin Moser. For 10 points each: [10] Name this object acquired by Cotter Martin on the day he skipped school and later stolen by Cotton's father Manx.
